jobs.title: Product Manager
jobs.description: Product Management position involving key responsibilities in planning and execution across a product's lifecycle.
jobs.other: This role may involve working with cross-functional teams to deliver strategic goals.

jobs.title: Product Manager, AI
jobs.description: Work on AI-driven product management processes, focusing on integrating AI technologies into existing products.
jobs.other: Requires a strong grasp of AI concepts and how they can be leveraged in product development.

jobs.title: Product Manager, Billing
jobs.description: Handle billing aspects of product management, ensuring users have seamless transaction experiences.
jobs.other: Focus may be on improving billing systems, processes, and user experience.

jobs.title: Product Manager, Data & ML Infrastructure
jobs.description: Manage data and machine learning infrastructure components of products.
jobs.other: Needs experience or interest in data infrastructures and ML frameworks.

jobs.title: Product Manager, Design Systems Foundations
jobs.description: Focus on the foundations of design systems and how they integrate into products.
jobs.other: Involves working closely with design and engineering teams.

jobs.title: Product Manager, Developer Tools
jobs.description: Concentrate on the development and refinement of tools for developers.
jobs.other: This requires collaboration with developer teams and understanding of their workflow needs.

jobs.title: Product Manager, FigJam
jobs.description: Oversee the FigJam product, ensuring it meets the needs of users through product updates and strategies.
jobs.other: Looking for creative input on product direction.

jobs.title: Product Manager, New Product Area
jobs.description: Manage the lifecycle of a new product area, from concept to market release.
jobs.other: Ideal for those interested in spearheading new initiatives.

jobs.title: Product Manager, Prototyping
jobs.description: Focus on prototyping aspects of product management, enhancing user testing capabilities.
jobs.other: Involves working with design and development for iterative testing and improvements.
